title: Mega Man 2
summary: Mega Man 2: The Mystery of Dr. Wily[lower-alpha 1] (stylized as Mega Man II on title screen) is an action game developed and published by Capcom for the Nintendo Entertainment System. It was released in Japan in 1988 and in North America and PAL regions the following years. Mega Man 2 continues Mega Man's battle against the evil Dr. Wily and his rogue robots. It introduced graphical and gameplay changes, many of which became series staples.
